title: My Picture - poem dramatizes the moment when

content.question: The poem dramatizes the moment when the speaker

choices.label: perceives the sun rising on his beloved
has to depart from his beloved
meditates on his beloved's present activities
faces the imminent departure of his beloved

content.answer: faces the imminent departure of his beloved

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
